mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (VID, UID, RATE, CONTENT, TIME, DEPTH, RE_ID) VALUES (#{vid}, #{uid}, #{rate}, #{content}, now(), #{depth}, #{re_id})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.uid, rate, content, time, depth, re_id, u.userid AS writer FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.uid = u.id WHERE vid = #{vid};
SELECT r.id, r.uid, rate, content, time, re_id, u.nickname AS writer FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.uid = u.id WHERE vid = #{vid} AND depth = 0;
SELECT r.id, r.uid, rate, content, time, re_id, u.nickname AS writer FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.uid = u.id WHERE vid = #{vid} AND depth = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM ( (SELECT id FROM review WHERE uid IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE userid = #{userid})) UNION (SELECT id FROM review WHERE re_id IN (SELECT id FROM review WHERE uid IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE userid = #{userid}))) ) A );
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET re_id = id WHERE id != re_id AND depth = 0
